src:
Cucu Somantri dan Iwan Budianto Dampingi Iwan Bule di PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Anggi Tiar


Cucu Somantri dan Iwan Budianto Dampingi Iwan Bule di PSSI

KBRN, Jakarta : Cucu Somantri dan Iwan Budianto dipastikan  bakal mendampingi Mochamad Iriawan memimpin Persatuan Sepak Bola Seluruh Indonesia (PSSI). Ya, keduanya dipastikan menjadi Wakil Ketua Umum (Waketum) PSSI Periode 2019-2023. Kepastian itu, setelah keduanya mengantongi suara terbanyak pada Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) Pemilihan PSSI yang berlangsung di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Dalam KLB Pemilihan PSSI itu, mendapatkan suara 81 dan Iwan Budianto mendapatkan raihan 74 suara dari 85 voter yang hadir.Mereka berdua mengungguli Djamal Aziz yang hanya mendapatkan 1 suara, Esti Puji Lestari 2 suara, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman 2 suara serta Hinca IP Pandjaitan 1 suara.  Secara otomatis, dengan perolehan dua orang suara terbanyak, Wakil Ketua Umum 1 akan dijabat oleh Cucu Somantri dan Wakil Ketua Umum 2 Iwan Budianto. Nantinya, mereka akan mendampingi Mochamad Iriawan atau yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule yang secara resmi telah terpilih menjadi Ketua Umum PSSI Periode 2019-2023 di KLB Pemilihan PSSI tersebut. Dari total 85 voter, mantan Kapolda Metro Jaya itu berhasil meraih 82 suara. Artinya, ia dinyatakan menang telak dan secara otomatis terpilih menjadi Ketua Umum PSSI Periode 2019-2024. "Sudah resmi Pak Iriawan jadi Ketua Umum PSSI. Dia menang mutlak dengan memperoleh 82 suara," kata Rahim kepada wartawan usai pemilihan Ketum PSSI.
text:
Cucu Somantri and Iwan Budianto Accompany Iwan Bule at PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Anggi Tiar


Cucu Somantri and Iwan Budianto Accompany Iwan Bule at PSSI

KBRN, Jakarta: Cucu Somantri and Iwan Budianto are certain to accompany Mochamad Iriawan to lead the All Indonesia Football Association (PSSI). Yes, both of them are confirmed to be Deputy Chairmen (Waketum) of PSSI 2019-2023. Certainty, after both pocketed the most votes at the Extraordinary Congress (KLB) PSSI Election which took place at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019). In the PSSI Election Outbreak, it won 81 votes and Iwan Budianto won 74 votes from the 85 voters present. They both outperformed Djamal Aziz who only got 1 vote, Esti Puji Lestari 2 votes, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman 2 votes and Hinca IP Pandjaitan 1 vote. Automatically, with the acquisition of the two most votes, Deputy Chairperson 1 will be held by Cucu Somantri and Deputy Chairperson 2 Iwan Budianto. Later, they will accompany Mochamad Iriawan or who is familiarly called Iwan Bule who has officially been elected as General Chair of PSSI 2019-2023 Period at the PSSI Election Outbreak. Of the total 85 voters, the former Metro Jaya Police Chief won 82 votes. That is, he was declared victorious and was automatically elected as General Chair of PSSI 2019-2024 Period. "Pak Iriawan has officially become the General Chair of PSSI. He won absolutely by getting 82 votes," Rahim told reporters after the PSSI Ketum election.
